snippet: Contestants in the New York Regional and National Yoga Asana Championship performed excruciating routines in a rare spotlight while counting on attentive, silent decorum from the audience.
abstract: Afton Carraway wins women's title at the New York Regional and National Yoga Asana Championship, and Jared McCann is the men's winner; Carraway and McCann will represent the United States in June at Bishnu Charan Ghosh Cup, an international championship in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: Contestants in the New York Regional and National Yoga Asana Championship performed excruciating routines in a rare spotlight while counting on attentive, silent decorum from the audience.

headline.seo: National Yoga Competition Tests Even the Audience
headline.main: Even Smiles Count, However Exacting the Competition
headline.print_headline: Even Smiles Count, However Exacting the Competition
